00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/email.php");
00003         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../models/diario_comment.php");

00010         class DiarioCommentEmail extends Email
00011         {
00012                 const default_subject = '%s ha scritto un commento sul Diario';
00013                 
00018                 public $URL;
00019 
00024                 private $comment;
00025                 
00031                 public function DiarioCommentEmail($params)
00032                 {
00033                         if (isset($params['comment']) &&
00034                                 $params['comment'] instanceof DiarioComment)
00035                         {
00036                                 $this->comment = $params['comment'];
00037                         }
00038                         else if (isset($params['comment_id']))
00039                         {                               
00040                                 $this->comment = new DiarioComment();
00041                                 $this->comment->find_by_id($params['comment_id']);
00042                         }
00043                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00044                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00045                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00046                                 $params['subject'] : sprintf(self::default_subject, $params['name']);
00047                         $this->URL = $params['URL'];
00048                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00049                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00050                         $this->text = $this->comment->text;
00051                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00052                 }
00053                 
00058                 public function make_text()
00059                 {
00060                         $moderate_url = $this->comment->moderate_url();
00061                         $discard_url = $this->comment->discard_url();
00062                         return <<<EOT
00063 Da: {$this->name}
00064 Email: {$this->email}
00065 URL: {$this->URL}
00066 IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}
00067 User Agent: {$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']}
00068 Data: {$this->date}
00069 
00070 {$this->text}
00071 
00072 Approva
00073 <{$moderate_url}>
00074 
00075 Elimina
00076 <{$discard_url}>
00077 
00078 -- 
00079 Emeraldion Lodge
00080 http://www.emeraldion.it
00081 
00082 EOT;
00083                 }
00084         }
